name: The Agency of Decay
description:
A bunch of people getting together to make innovative game design experiences and talk about deep stuff through games, in a positive and joyful process.

This game was passionately made by Thomas Gonzalez, Sacha Mathelet, Eliot Trouttet, Juliette Pereira, Tom Rivière, Fred Urien and Marie Wesolek.

Special thanks to Bac, Lethae and Milo for thinking hard about the theme.
